description:
Our mission as a Chicago SEO Strategy & training company is to teach search engine optimization through customized SEO training courses that give business owners the tools and knowledge they need to grow their business online and gain skills specific to their individual needs.Â 
Our SEO classes are great for small business owners, entrepreneurs, marketing departments and anyone that is interested in having their website rank higher in Google.
